description:
In this course you will get the goal setting theory and practical exercises that will help you focus on what's most important in your life, and actually get on your way to achieving those things.

The materials in this course are based on:

  • Myself helping thousands of entrepreneurs set and achieve their goals
  • My lifelong goal setting learning experience from some of the top personal development coaches like Tony Robbins, Brian Tracy and Zig Zigler
  • A collection of practical exercises to help you identify and focus on what your main goals should be

Why goals are important

Your goals are the foundation of everything you do in your personal and professional life. Everything you do is based on your goals. So setting the right goals and focusing on the right goals for you is monumentally important. 

Imagine looking back at your life and realizing that you pursued wrong goals or mis-goals. It would be a mis-life. 

Don't let that happen to you. Sign up for this course, and learn to identify your correct goals, and get on your way to achieving them.
title: Goal setting: how to set big goals and work towards them
